      • toggleMobileData

        public static void toggleMobileData(android.content.Context context,
                    boolean enabled)
                             throws _3GUtil.MobileDataException
        open/close 3G/2G data radio (not work on Ophone)
        参数:
        context -
        enabled - true-open; false-close
        抛出:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException
        java.lang.SecurityException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        _3GUtil.MobileDataException

      • getMobileDataStatus

        public static boolean getMobileDataStatus(android.content.Context context)
                                   throws _3GUtil.MobileDataException
        get the status of 3G/2G data
        参数:
        context -
        返回:
        true if 3g/2g radio open, false if 3g/2g radio close
        抛出:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException
        java.lang.SecurityException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
        _3GUtil.MobileDataException
